amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for periodic censuses and programs by $4 million and increases funding for Interagency Crime and Drug Enforcement by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Periodic Censuses and Programs by $4 million and to increase funding for Interagency Crime and Drug Enforcement by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Gibson.
